entry.title: Douglas County Sheriff’s Office Mourns the Loss of K9 Ozzy
entry.summary: Douglas County K9 Ozzy has passed away following health complications. The 8-year-old German Shepherd served faithfully since 2020, assisting in 88 apprehensions. He is remembered for his bravery, loyalty, and lifesaving actions alongside Deputy Barden.

entry.title: SHERIFF’S OFFICE ANNOUNCES PASSING OF K9 OZZY
entry.summary: April 30, 2025 3:40 a.m. The Douglas County Sheriff’s Office has announced the passing of K9 Ozzy, due to health complications. Undersheriff Brad O’Dell said that Ozzy, an 8-year-old German Shepherd, was certified for duty on May 22, 2020, and faithfully served DCSO and the citizens of the county until his retirement on April 23rd....

entry.title: Douglas County School Forestry Tour shows fifth grade students first hand about the forest
entry.summary: Last week, fifth-grade students from across Douglas County stepped into the forest for the annual School Forestry Tour, where they learned firsthand about wildlife, forestry management, and the natural environment.
